meaningMnemonic:
This is the <radical>cow</radical> radical. It kind of looks like the long face of a cow, right? Specifically a boy cow, since you can think of that top horizontal line as its horns. Seeing it yet? It's got a little tuft of hair on its head, and some kind of accessory on the horn to your left, so this is a very stylish cow.

(And yes, you may say a "boy cow" isn't a "cow," but we're still calling this a cow. Please don't write in about it — we don't want any beef.)
